overview:
Robert KÃ¶nig - just Rob - is a passionate entrepreneur living in Berlin and Co-Founder of aSpot.at/ a startup, which is creating a marketplace for temporary work space and hot desking by sub-letting “Spots” within existing companies. You can call his venture “the Airbnb for offices” as well as “office surfing”. Originally, he is a nationally certified banker, who decided to focus on its soft skills while being well organized.

As a sportsmen, surfer and globetrotter he is open minded as well as confident. Its career started @ T-COM Innovations followed by various jobs for investors such as flexkapital & Team Europe Ventures.

Rob owns a Diploma in International Management. He attended the University of Applied Science in Heilbronn an the Mahidol University in Bangkok.

Focussing on the internet business, Rob is also into streetart leading a project called TAPE OVER - consisting of a team of artists expressing themselves with Tape Art.
